website_summaries.verdict: This regulation-size dartboard features a high-visibility LED score display that offers a wide variety of options for family fun.
pros: Nylon segments make the board more durable and extend playability
Thin segment dividers reduce bounce outs
cons: Very loud noises when electronics start
Annoying heckler option is automatic upon startup

customer_reviews.title: We are terribly disappointed because up until the last couple of days ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this on 12/21/17 and it is currently 2/23/18 and not working properly. Nothing improper has happened and yet we get an Error 10 message when we turn it on. My husband has attempted to fix this problem by taking it apart and it's still malfunctioning. We are terribly disappointed because up until the last couple of days our family has really enjoyed this product. We have had many fun family games with this gift that Santa brought. We certainly expected more than two months of use out of something we paid almost $200 for 60 days ago.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.text: Paid $200 for this an extra darts, only lasted 2 months! Doesn't work and have not been able to get help from Amazon or the company who sells it. BUYER BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.author: T-H

customer_reviews.title: Product does not work. If i could give zero ...
customer_reviews.text: Product does not work. If i could give zero stars I would. Dartboard is stuck on arachnid greeting and none of the bottoms give any reaction. Product just keeps saying arachnid and then after about 15 minutes says ----sleep----- and still nothing!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bernhardt

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE BEWARE BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Darts will not stick. We tried several types, short, long, fat, skinny - the darts just bounce out. After 5 months the voice that announces the dart number you hit quit working. For $250 I expected quality. I found out it had a 90 day warranty so I'm out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: nealioh

customer_reviews.title: BAD PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Horrible purchase!!!!! The box had been opened and re-taped shut. It did not come with an adapter cord or darts. I shouldn’t have to take the time to send it back and start over. This is so disappointing!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly S.

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure there's something better out there for the money
customer_reviews.text: VERY Noise, and only works about half the time, I'm sure there's something better out there for the money...
customer_reviews.author: AL Hull

customer_reviews.title: No value....way too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Wow...I really thought it would be built better. Feels like cheap plastic, no different than a $29.99 model except it has more games and makes more siunds
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Not built for quality!
customer_reviews.text: The Arachnid name was historically known for high quality commercial products. This dart board is however built by Escalade Sports, which is selling their product under the "Arachnid" name. After approximately 20-30 uses, half of the board no longer registers a dart (or finger push). In calling Escalade Sports, their recommendation was to simply buy a new $200 CricketPro 800. They didn't have an explanation in terms of how or why this happens. Seems like an expensive option to do every few years. I'm currently on the hunt for a better quality dart board and will update this post with alternatives. My advice: stay away from Escalade/Arachnid!
customer_reviews.author: Raleigh, NC

customer_reviews.title: This board is just like I remember playing in a Dart traveling league!
customer_reviews.text: I really love my new Arachnid Dart Board. I'm a retired, unretired in another state school teacher. This Dart Board is the most relaxing thing I've done in many years. I started playing on Arachnid boards when I was 32 and continued until I was 50. I was on in-house dart leagues as well as traveling dart leagues in the suburbs of Houston. I'm now 73, and I can't believe I semi still have my eye. My son in Austin has an Arachnid board he bought 20 years ago.....still works. Thank you Arachnid for keeping the quality and not changing your board. My hat is off to you. Paul M. Speer
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Speer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice dart board
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only used this board a few times but my sons love it. Very durable & exactly what we expected. Many games & user friendly. We added a laser light that we mounted below which works great to show the shooting line on the floor. Also mounted a spotlight above the board to shine on it which is nice too. I would recommend to any avid dart player.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda B.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: There's many dart boards out there, but this one is truly at the top. As I learned the hard way, don't be fooled by the other companies that have the flashy side boards; they stop working after a while and the plastics they use are sub-par. This board has much tougher plastic which is good for the kids or... otherwise impaired adult. Spend a little more now so you don't have to buy 2 or 3 times over in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Works just like the ones in the bars
customer_reviews.text: Works just like the ones in the taverns/bars. Easy to hang on the wall. Easy to program and play the games you want. Doesn't sound like the ones in the bars. Bar boards are quieter when the tip hits the board. Something that we are used to now. Can use your own soft darts on this board. Don't always have to use the ones that came with it. In my opinion, they are too light for me. Lights/sounds are great. The heckling feature, can be turned on or off. First thought it was funny, now it's annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfied 🎯
customer_reviews.text: Quality board. We play a lot of darts as I'm in a league. We've had it a few months now and played hundreds of games on it. We'll see how it holds up in the long hull.. Back hooks for screws are plastic with little support which concerns me. Screws it comes with were very cheap and broke while installing in wall stubs, but no big deal, just used some others I had around the house. Heckler light doesn't work properly, but the sound is fine. Looks like it had already been opened, maybe returned then resold..? Overall worth the money so far though! Keeps score good. So far no serious regrets. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Richard E.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these a year ago and never got around to putting it up. Finally did last week and it didn’t work. I though leaving it in the garage for a year effected it, so I ordered a new one. The new one is broken out of the box too. Total junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this dart board
customer_reviews.text: After seeing the reviews I was hesitant to buy this dart board. I bought it anyway and could not be happier. Yes sometimes darts bounce out. Usually it is because of a bad throw. The store for works just as well that's the big commercial ones in bars. I will say we enjoyed it much more than once we bought a set of bar style darts for it. They are much tougher and withstand a lot more abuse. Something happened to this one I would not hesitate to buy another one right away.
customer_reviews.author: N Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Great board fix the sound settings
customer_reviews.text: These is a great board and the yellow dividers make it much easier to see between numbers which to me is way better than boards with dark colors. Darts stick well for a electronic board and there are a ton of games to chose from. Only complaint is the sound. Every time you turn the board on the volume is on high and the start up music will wake the neighbors. Also when switching games it turns the heckler mode on. Heckler mode is funny the first couple nights you play but after that quite annoying
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice board. Included darts, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: We now play darts in our game room basement bar every Friday night thanks to this board. Scores well, and the assortment of games is great. The included darts are not that impressive though, as the tails frequently come out, and are hard to reinstall in the low light of a tavern. Bought the 12 pack of hard tail Arachnid darts, and they are holding up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Huggmeister

customer_reviews.title: It works for me
customer_reviews.text: have an old arachnid 5000 series English mark darts game from a bar. was not able to get repair parts any longer so just mounted it to the front of the game. works fine and even has the overhead light shine on the dartboard for that authentic bar game feel.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Saracco

customer_reviews.title: Great board with minor irritants
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The only drawbacks are - the Heckler feature turns on automatically. And it's stupid. The volume defaults to high every time you turn it on. And, the announcement program insists on finishing what it starts saying, even if it misses the more important message from the latest dart. Honestly, minor irritants for a well built board with lots of very useful features.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Brainard

customer_reviews.title: got one, exchanged it bc malfunctioned, second one did the same thing
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about the dartboard except the first one the 7 field would not work, exchanged it and then the second one worked for a couple weeks and then starting not calculating score right and upper half would mishap off and on. A shame bc it is a good conceptual dart board.
customer_reviews.author: Kayley Harper

customer_reviews.title: Great Dartboard
customer_reviews.text: Love this dartboard. Looks great and is super easy to use. The only (minor) annoyance is that the annoying heckler is on by default. My brother and I played this for hours over a weekend and it functioned perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: C. Konfrst

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: This dart board worked great for six months. Then it abruptly stopped working. When it stopped working, I ran an electrical tester to the outlet, along the power cord, and along the dartboard. All had power, but the display on the dartboard didn’t work. So the problem is with the dart board. We used this dart board 2-3 times per week over the past six months. Normal use- my girlfriend and I. Apparently it has an electrical malfunction. AKA giant piece of shit. Quite disappointing considering the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great but the voice is a heckler
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the voice is a heckler? Didn’t know that. Also the screen doesn’t light up, it’s all analog.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hull

customer_reviews.title: Great dartboard
customer_reviews.text: Very good dartboard. It works flawlessly. I’ve had no issues whatsoever. I’m not sure why it has so many negative reviews.
customer_reviews.author: clint folmar

customer_reviews.title: Revised: Darts fall apart but company is quick to act.
customer_reviews.text: Original: The plastic tips break almost immediately. The plastic tails on the darts are also starting to break and no replacements were included. Revised: After contacting the manufacturer they quickly responded and sent replacement darts at no charge. Excellent customer service if you run into the same issue. The board itself has been lots of fun to play while under quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dart board is great! Only got 4 stars because the darts it ...
customer_reviews.text: Dart board is great ! Only got 4 stars because the darts it came with were decent but the tips and flights weren't they are a little on the cheap side tips are long and flimsy bend really easy so you have to keep straining them more then other tips .and flights tore really easy with little use yes they are wear and tear parts but could be manufactured a little better but then again they are the darts that came with the board .The board it's self is great no problems it's Ben very fun and accurate love it !
customer_reviews.author: zachary

customer_reviews.title: Bought for family game nights
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for family game nights. Used for the first time on 2/8/2020 and it worked as expected. The darts and tips that come with it are just okay (which I expected), the tips bend and break somewhat easily. based on other reviews of this product, I ordered some higher quality darts and tips, it made a difference in the ease of removing them from the board. So far I am very happy with the purchase and would recommend it. I will update this review if needed later, hopefully that won't be necessary. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, pure frustration
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible, 2nd board never played one full game ..throw 3 darts, next player throw 1 dart, next player..customer service horrible as well..they responded with a ticket ..asked for a video so I uploaded and they haven’t gotten back to me..Finally I just returned to Amazon and low and behold next one did same thing..Done! Going back to a regular dart board.. I wonder if they are being counter fitted nice side the reviews don’t match up with this peice of garbage ...So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this dart board
customer_reviews.text: I love this dart board. Have used it every time the kids come to visit and have had many hours of fun and enjoyment from this product. It is very sturdy and was very easy to hang. I'd recommend this to every one. The darts stick well and is sometimes a little hard to remove but only takes a little strength and a twist to get them out. Had it since 1/25/17 and love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: David Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Just like the old days
customer_reviews.text: This dartboard is excellent with the exception of the goofy commentary in speech mode. Board plays very well and keeps good score for you. Nylon board seems very durable. Only problem I have is a lot of dart tips breaking and getting stuck in segments.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise its a great board for home play
customer_reviews.text: It can be a little bit of a pain to select your game numbers, but otherwise its a great board for home play! We actually LIKE the heckler! haha
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Nice dart board despite missing part.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this as a father's day gift and I've really enjoyed it so far. It was missing one set of flights, but I have my personal set so I wasn't upset. I still give it 5 stars due to the 4 person display, the adjustable Heckler, and the computerized opponent.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Programming
customer_reviews.text: The computer is absolutely ridiculous. There is no way on Novice that anyone gets 6 double bulleyes in a game. Whoever programmed this board is out of reality. It is near impossible to beat the computer on any level. Why sell a game that the computer can switch players but we have to hit next player every time? Are the same programmers responsible for this and the the computer not being able to be beat the same? If so fire them all.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great dartboard!!
customer_reviews.text: This dartboard is fantastic! I set it up today and played it for an hour. Only one bounce out and that was due to a bad throw. Scorekeeping is perfect and the display is easy to read from the throw line. Wonderful board, glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Good dart board
customer_reviews.text: Dartboard is great. One of the main reasons we chose to purchase this one was alot of the reviews for other boards mention the darts not sticking well or popping out. Due to the design of using square holes there are no pop outs on this, in fact they are rather hard to pull out at times. Great board and the heckle feature is fun
customer_reviews.author: Jay Reed

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: It is the best you can find for a home electronic board IMO. Still seems not of the bext quality, but it works well. It is hard to get the darts out though, and there certainly are bounce offs!
customer_reviews.author: Rample

customer_reviews.title: This is something you will use and enjoy for what I hope to be a long time.
customer_reviews.text: My family and I are having a lot of fun with this new addition to the man cave. With the electronic scoring, there's more truth to scoring (you know what I mean) than the steel darts often provide. All kidding aside, it really is a nice board and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: frankc

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this board and handful off times, was great at first, but after awhile you can see the center of board fluctuate in, and the it starts displaying error codes, when I took it down and pushed on the back of the board the center popped back out, still displays error codes, the sturdiness of this board is below par and for what you pay for it it should be built a lot better
customer_reviews.author: John Robinson

customer_reviews.title: decent buy
customer_reviews.text: it's a good consumer based board. can't expect anything more for the price. It's not a professional grade board but its not a profession grade price either so for the price it's a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S.

customer_reviews.title: Great FUN!!
customer_reviews.text: A quality unit. After 3 months is still holding up to the errant dart impacts without damage. A myriad of options and games including beat the computer. I almost purchased one with the display and buttons on the side for the previous reason but darts miss in all directions :D. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy M. Null

customer_reviews.title: I love the variety of games
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety of games! I hated that I couldn't get the red bullseye to register 50 points in 01 games. I followed the instructions to the letter I called the manufacturer 2x and had to have another board sent. The replacement board had the same problem, so I went to a sporting good store and I tried to have them show me how to set up the bullseye, they couldn't do it either. So I ended up having to send the board back....
customer_reviews.author: Tim Wilborn

customer_reviews.title: Great board so far
customer_reviews.text: I like the scoreboard for cricket, which was a big reason I chose this one. The heckler is amusing but it’s good that it can turned off. Easy to mount and sits tight to the wall. The darts themselves that are included are ok BUT the tips were terrible and the flights not much better. I changed out both and the bounce outs went down substantially. Tips will break often and need replacement. Sometimes the darts are hard to remove and the tips break off in the board which needs to be avoided. Still working on that.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works and plays as expected
customer_reviews.text: Decided to purchase even after reading the negative reviews; glad I did. Great dart board, works as expected with no negative issues from me.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan D Weigel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful board
customer_reviews.text: The board is great! The heckler gets to be a bit annoying, so the did a great job with that ;) Also, the game rules they provide are great..... UNTIL "By5's", then it gets to be a bit comical.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was large family gift for game room. Was tested on New Year's eve with a party of 40 people. All the teens and grown ups alike really enjoyed. It has worked well.
customer_reviews.author: SavvyLady

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great dart board. I like the fact that you can adjust volume and all the different games. The voice is very clear and I seldom get a bounce back. The board keeps score perfectly. I would highly recommend this board.
customer_reviews.author: MIke

customer_reviews.title: When you takr it out of the box you find ...
customer_reviews.text: When you takr it out of the box you find that its made of cheap plastic. Not something i wanted hanging on my wall. Also the dart tips are made from plastic and either break or bend almost everytime you throw them.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Broke and nowhere to fix
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working after sometime using. It was great while it was working, but some sectors stopped functioning. Overtime more sectors stopped working. Tried to contact and look for customer service and wasn’t able to get in contact. Now it’s simply useless... Product is nice, but very unreliable for $200.
customer_reviews.author: xBranco

customer_reviews.title: Loud! But fun.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to a real dart board this sucker is loud! Each dart is like drum strike. Could be because the back side is hollow Butnitsnfun and keeps great score and is really nice. Just wish it wasn't so loud.
customer_reviews.author: TRMC

customer_reviews.title: It is a professional board with great features
customer_reviews.text: Do love dartboard. So far working very good. Excellent features. But beware! Did not come with power cord had to wait for a month.???????? Not cool. Good luck
customer_reviews.author: Vette Guy

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: When you turn it on, the volume defaults to full volume, which is obnoxiously loud and annoying. The heckler mode comes on every time as well, which is really a useless function. Those aside, it appears well built and is fun once you turn off/ down the audibles.
customer_reviews.author: Scot J. Serafin

customer_reviews.title: No power cord or darts
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived without the power cord and darts. Completely useless. Returning immediately. Waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: K. Oylear

customer_reviews.title: Serious let down.
customer_reviews.text: Dart tips and flights are complete garbage. Did not even get through one game with my neighbor after we installed it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Harig

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: After first buying another brand that fell apart immediately I began searching reviews online, the arachnid is not cheap, but is very well worth the money. The old saying “you get what you pay for” is very true in this case, don’t go cheap buy this one, I would rate this the best electronic dart board out there after having it for 6 weeks + now. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Darts don't stick
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. I bought an arachnid dartboard in college (25 years ago) and enjoyed it for about two decades. This time around I decided to upgrade to an 800 and it feels like a downgrade. There is such a high bounce rate. I rarely get all 3 darts in a round to stick. You'd think twenty years later - and with an advanced model that the experience would be exponentially better, but it's worse. I highly regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great dart board.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this dart board. Easy to mount! Worked perfectly out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: carl feil

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I had another board that lasted for 4 days once and less than 4 hours the second time. I purchased this one due to the rating it hand and the reviews I read. I have played on it for over a month now and no issues, very responsive and looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: kurt

customer_reviews.title: Nice board
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy playing darts on this board, scoring is electronics work well. Easy to start a game. The only negative is the darts that came with the product. The tips are terrible. Went thru the bag that was sen in two days. Bought replacement tips that work much better. Bought this to keep us entertained while stuck at home.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Forschler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Husbands birthday gift, he was as in love with it! He even went and made a huge backboard for it from carpet tiles and thick cardboard!
customer_reviews.author: Naomie Gough

customer_reviews.title: Awesome board!
customer_reviews.text: It's been a while since I purchased this, but I can without a doubt say this is the best wall mounted dartboard I have ever played on. I don't mean to sound like a commercial, but buy it now. They darts stick, you get very few bounce outs. The scoring is great. The heckle feature is amusing, but easily turned off if found annoying. My favorite part about the board is the awesome cricket scoring! Easy to see. Very fun!
customer_reviews.author: JetEyeNight

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, right price!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, more options than we need, but just the right size. Would make a great gift for grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Karpen

customer_reviews.title: Garbage don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Broke after the first two weeks of owning up display screen does not even come up any more garbage
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy V

customer_reviews.title: awesome dart board
customer_reviews.text: awesome dart board. lots of fun games to play and the large screen makes playing cricket with friends even more fun!
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my kids for Christmas. They love it. The heckle mode is funny. The games are enjoyable and the board is easy to manipulate to get to games, change players, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Nerdzilla

customer_reviews.title: Got it a couple of minutes ago opened it up ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it a couple of minutes ago opened it up to find out it's missing the a.c. adapter. I bought as new and the box has clearly been retaped and the clear cover was not on the screen display.
customer_reviews.author: joel

customer_reviews.title: You will need to buy darts as the ones that come with this are worthless
customer_reviews.text: We THINK we like the board and games, however after using the darts once all if the ‘flags’ have fallen off and are ripped so we cannot place them back in the darts the tips have all broken off or broke and are now stuck in tells barrel of the dart, making them useless.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Conley

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny! Great board!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I know that sounds cliche, but this is just another example of it. Spend the extra money and make game time a fun time, instead of an aggravation. Great BOARD. Not sure what the thinking was behind storing your darts in front of the board, but just do like I do and ignore that option. The darts are awful, but the board works great. You should be buying your own darts anyway, if you want to shoot consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Adams

customer_reviews.title: Dart
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we bought. The fist one was November 2018. The numbers started sticking and the error message was coming on a lot. So we bought another one in November 2019. It's only been 4 months and it's doing the same thing. The first one lasted a year, this one only lasted 4 months. Disappointed in this for $220, it should of lasted at least a year again.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Bouillion

customer_reviews.title: adequate.  power adapter works inconsistently
customer_reviews.text: Cord needs to be wiggled around to make it work. When it does work it is great.
customer_reviews.author: mt

customer_reviews.title: Best electronic dart board !
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of looking around and this is the best electronic dartboard out there for the price, worth the money. No problems, minimal bounce outs and hours of fun so far.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy !!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's birthday, and he said he is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Mcgee

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all dart Enthusiasts
customer_reviews.text: Great dart board. Endless amount of games to play. Solo play against the cpu is difficult so bring your "A" game. Great instructions for mounting. I suggest using Quality wood screws or anchors from your local hardware store. The hardware supplied is a little sub par for me. Also suggest fabricating a plastic shield or protector for the control/scoring panel. The darts will pierce a hole in it if a mis-throw should happen to occur. Otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: Albert J. Gallagher Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly difficult to mount; bad design deffect.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the top-of-the-line consumer Arachnid boards yet the mounting is the most impractical and unsturdy I could imagine. Completely frustrating. They know there will be darts thrown and pulled from the board and they provide two flat head screws that you don't allow for a snug fit. It really is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Dart board
customer_reviews.text: This dartboard is awesome. It plays really well and holds up to the kids. The included darts were actually pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Keith A

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still lasting after 2 years, plastic cover on readout needs to be improved so it doesn't crack
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Smith

customer_reviews.title: Husband gift
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t used this a lot but have played about 20 games so far it is very sturdy. My husband loves it. I hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Dana M.

customer_reviews.title: Measure and remeasure
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased this dart board. The darts are difficult to remove from the board, so we decided to mount the board to a piece of plywood covered in corkboard (for those stray darts). As we were mounting the dartboard per written instructions we noticed the hanging holes did not match up. Upon actual measurement it was noted the measurements given in the written instructions were off so...beware. Other than that so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: AZ reader

customer_reviews.title: Great Board!
customer_reviews.text: Have had it over a year, great fun for the family, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Griff

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Our whole family has been enjoying this dartboard. Great family fun! We had a similar dartboard for years that stopped working. This dartboard has a lot more game options so we do not get board.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Quality isn’t there
customer_reviews.text: Lots of bounce outs and broken tips on this board. Scoring is great but quality is no where near what you get with a G3. Segments and dividers don’t resemble what you get in a bar. Going GranBoard 3 next
customer_reviews.author: CaptainTurf

customer_reviews.title: the flights and the tips included are very flimsy and break easily. However
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before purchasing this dart board for my boyfriend. The one common theme was the darts themselves; the flights and the tips included are very flimsy and break easily. However, that is an easy fix! We have since purchased tips and flights. The dart board is amazing and very easy to use. There are a lot of games for accuracy and it's easy to use. I would recommend this dart board to everyone, just buy your own tips and flights!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heckler feature and obnoxiously loud volume on start up are annoying features that I would like to be able to ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent electronic dart board. Have used it almost daily for three months and it has held up well. Darts it comes with needed to be upgraded to make it playable. Heckler feature and obnoxiously loud volume on start up are annoying features that I would like to be able to permanently disable.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Perciaccante

customer_reviews.title: Good board, but problems
customer_reviews.text: Okay for the price, but half of the numbers don't light up properly
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This board design holds the darts better than most others fewer bounce outs. Still counts the points even if there is a bounce out.
customer_reviews.author: Al & Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great for home
customer_reviews.text: Easy to attach to wall. Not a huge fan of the heckling, but that is easily turned off. I've played league and this board is not as good as most bars' boards, but better than all the man cave boards I've played on. If you don't want to spend the money for a full cabinet, this is a great compromise.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Bright

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of features available.
customer_reviews.text: The number of games and game options is great. The heckler feature is nice, but can get annoying. At least you can turn that off. Bounce outs and non scoring darts still do occur. Not sure if it is more or less than with my previous board.
customer_reviews.author: S. Reigart

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is garbage. The product description simply could not be more inaccurate. The board is flimsy, cheap and not nearly worth the cost paid. Save your money and buy from another seller because these guys are here to promise one thing and deliver another.
customer_reviews.author: Dane Lomax

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Does everything a dart board should do and has kept the family entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Keaton

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DARTBOARD!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this board!! Have had different brands in the past and this one is the best. Very few bounce outs if you use super short tips.
customer_reviews.author: ryan propes

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully, so many great gaming options!
customer_reviews.text: We love this product. We had a great time at Thanksgiving with family playing teams and winning and losing. The dartboard was easy to hang, works wonderfully!! Fun for the whole family! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Bought the Vopa 17g darts which are much ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Bought the Vopa 17g darts which are much better than the ones that came with the board. The darts stick really well...sometimes too well and are hard to pull out.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Truxal

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible dart board. I want a full refund. I tried getting in touch with manufacturer but they sent me back to you. Please advise
customer_reviews.author: gretchen jones

customer_reviews.title: It is probably the best purchase I have made for my home bar
customer_reviews.text: Been using this (quite a lot) for a year now. Not one issue. Nothing. It is probably the best purchase I have made for my home bar. Buy this board, go buy nice darts at a dart store and you are all set.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for about 6 weeks, now it is junk!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dartboard Fantastic-Darts Awful
customer_reviews.text: The dartboard thus far has been as advertised-- good performance. The darts that came with it were extremely cheap! The plastic was so thin and fragile, we went through half bag of the replacement tips within a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: JON PARKER

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We have spent hours and hours playing on this board. It works fantastic. The darts that come with it are not the greatest but other than that it’s a great board!!
customer_reviews.author: josh schneider

customer_reviews.title: Good board
customer_reviews.text: Good board. No issues and gets used almost daily. The heckle feature is annoying so its turned off immediately when we play
customer_reviews.author: John DeBaeke

customer_reviews.title: Quality Entertainment
customer_reviews.text: This unit is awesome. Everything works, games are very enjoyable and there are so many to choose from. Perfect addition to my game room. I’m glad I bought this and not a cheap one.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Cline

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, was easy to install, and easy to operate. Perfect electronic dartboard for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, lots of games and useful features
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, great features (lots of games, verbal instructions, heckler mode is fun but can be turned off).. My teens use this all the time, great for the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: MITwinMom

product_meta.title: Arachnid Cricket Pro 800 Electronic Dartboard with NylonTough Segments for Improved Durability and Playability and Micro-thin Segment Dividers for ReducedBounce-outs
product_meta.description: Play like a pro with this Arachnid Cricket Pro 800 Talking Electronic Dartboard that includes all of the games and features players are looking for. Top-of-the-line features include an 8 player score display with 4 player X & O scores shown simultaneously, as well as 39 Games and 179 options including 7 cricket games. An optional 3 level "Heckler" feature adds another level of entertainment. Made with NylonTough segments to ensure a lifetime of fun and competition. Regulation 15.5" target area. Accessories included.
feature_bullets: Tournament-Quality Electronic Dartboard- Regulation 15.5” Target Area
NylonTough Segments Improve Durability and Playability
Micro-Thin Segment Dividers Dramatically Reduce Bounce-Outs
Up to 8 Players with 4-Player Jumbo X/O LED Score Display

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
